duties_responsibilities.duty: Safely operate the company delivery truck (usually 24’ truck) and deliver product to customers in a professional and courteous manner.
Perform pre and post trip inspection of truck and load trucks with electric or pump pallet jack.
Deliver product on docks using pump pallet jack, and provide product wherever customer needs (upstairs, downstairs, on shelves etc.) with 2 wheel hand cart.
Pick up returns, vendor pick-ups, and provide an excellent level of customer service to both internal and external customers.
Report to work on time, work overtime as required, and maintain a valid driver’s license.
